title.rendered: Rishabh Pant gets successfully operated a knee surgery for a ligament tear

content.rendered:
Rishabh Pant, the Indian cricketer batsman, is claimed to own had winning knee surgery at the Kokilaben Dhirubhai Ambani Hospital. consistent with new reports, surgery was performed on Friday, and therefore the jock is healing quickly below the observation of the medical team. Pant was airlifted to Mumbai from Dehradun’s GHB Hospital, wherever he had been hospitalized once in a tragic car accident on December 30. (Read Also: Asian Cricket Council criticizes PCB Chairman’s remarks targeting Jay Shah)

“Rishabh Pant has with success undergone a knee ligament surgery on Friday. He can be under observation. Any course of action and rehabilitation is suggested by Dr. Dinshaw Pardiwala and followed by the BCCI sports science & medical team.” BCCI told PTI.

Meanwhile, the BCCI issued a press release earlier in the week claiming that the wicketkeeper will bear surgery in Mumbai. Their medical team will follow the cricketer’s recovery and rehabilitation.

“The Board will create each effort to assist and expedite the recovery method of Rishabh Pant and can offer him all the support, he desires throughout this period,” scanned BCCI statement.

According to the specialists, Pant had a significant ligament injury. It will like a minimum of 8-9 months to recuperate and come back to full fitness. This suggests that the left-handed baseball player won’t solely have the forthcoming IPL 2023.However, he may additionally miss the Asia Cup and therefore the 50-over World Cup.

“Every player’s frame is special however searching at his (Rishabh Pant) report. Our docs say the ligament damage is just like the one (Ravindra) Jadeja suffered. In keeping with the reviews, acquired from Dehradun, we had been instructed that Pant might want a surgical procedure soon.

“It seems like he’s going to take greater than six months to recover.” A legit source shared with The Indian Express.

Ravindra Jadeja, India’s choicest all-rounder, suffered a comparable ligament tear final year, retaining him out for tons of the season. Jadeja needed to withdraw from the Asia Cup 2022 throughout the occasion and did now no longer play withinside the T20 World Cup 2022 due to the fact that he changed into recuperating at the time.

Team India is presently engaged in a bilateral white-ball collection towards Sri Lanka. After that Team would face New Zealand earlier than Australia in a four-Test series. While the IPL 2023 season is ready to start in the final week of March.
